sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An answere to certaine scandalous papers, scattered abroad vnder colour of a Catholicke admonition Salisbury, Robert Cecil, Earl of, 1563-1612.
[44] p.
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : 1606.
The author's name, [Robert Cecil] Earl of Salisbury, appears on B2v. Includes one of the papers addressed to Salisbury, signed "A.B.C. &c.". Signatures: A-E⁴ F² . The last leaf is blank. All gathering except E are found in two or three different settings or impositions in various combinations. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

The author's name, [Robert Cecil] Earl of Salisbury, appears on B2v. Includes one of the papers addressed to Salisbury, signed "A.B.C. &c.". Signatures: A-E⁴ F² . The last leaf is blank. All gathering except E are found in two or three different settings or impositions in various combinations. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
Robert Barker
